ace-constitution-docs.description: ACE constitution markdown documentation structure with auto-generated pattern principles
patterns: Auto-generated header with metadata (last updated, total count)
Structured pattern entries with confidence, language, observations

confidence-based-curation.description: Pattern curation system using confidence thresholds for adding/removing content

markdown-metadata-headers.description: Markdown documentation with italicized metadata headers for auto-generation tracking

living-documentation.description: Self-updating documentation that evolves based on system learning and confidence metrics

hierarchical-pattern-organization.description: Multi-level pattern categorization with language grouping and individual pattern sections

cross-document-linking.description: Relative path links between related documentation files for navigation

data-driven-documentation.description: Generate documentation from actual data metrics rather than manual writing

transparent-auto-generation.description: Clearly mark auto-generated content with timestamps and disclaimers

confidence-driven-inclusion.description: Use statistical confidence thresholds to determine content inclusion/exclusion

progressive-pruning.description: Use lazy pruning with lower thresholds to avoid premature removal of learning patterns

metadata.discovery_method: bottom-up from markdown structure, metadata patterns, and confidence-based curation system
metadata.analysis_notes: Constitution file demonstrates auto-generated living documentation with confidence-based pattern curation, cross-referencing to playbook specs, and transparent metadata tracking
